Title: Chapter 22
Writer: Michael Dobbs (based on the novels by), Andrew Davies (based on the mini-series by), Beau Willimon (created for television by), Beau Willimon
Actors: Kevin Spacey, Robin Wright, Michael Kelly, Michel Gill
Plot: It becomes personal when Tusk hits the Underwood pair with a scandal. Freddy and his restaurant will be involved in it all.
